snippet: The Italian marines, who were part of an antipiracy military security team, are accused of fatally shooting two Indian fishermen who they believed were pirates.
abstract: Italian Foreign Ministry says that two Italian marines facing murder charges in India will not be returned there for trial; marines are accused of fatally shooting two Indian fisherman who they believed were pirates in February 2012.
lead_paragraph: The Italian marines, who were part of an antipiracy military security team, are accused of fatally shooting two Indian fishermen who they believed were pirates.

headline.seo: Italian Marines Will Not Be Returned to India for Trial
headline.main: Italy: 2 Marines Will Not Be Returned to India for Trial
headline.print_headline: Italy: 2 Marines Will Not Be Returned to India for Trial
